questions.quote: What kinda great friend are you? How do you go from snubbing to kissing?
Yeah. Well, you know, she was lucky I was in a good mood - coulda been a lot worse.
No. He blew out my Witchy Woman, and he won't share Desperado. Hey, what d'you think of Oye Como Va?
You know, it was really wrong of you to back out on that deal.
Would you like to buy me a fat-free frozen yogurt at the store, Kramer?
Have you seen the chest of drawers that Brett gave to Kramer?
Oh beautiful. Listen, we've got a little problem here, we've got two extra tickets.
That's funny because I haven't seen you working for a while. A long while.
I'm terribly sorry, Mr. Ross. One never knows how the gastrointestinal workings of the equine are going to function.
So? For a twenty-five dollar cleaning, I can listen to some pointless blather.
